title: #259: Examining Race and Police Conflicts with Douglas Flowe, Part 3
description:
Washington University professor and author Douglas Flowe completes his discussion with Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti. They talk about the issues of systematic racism in the police force and offers some hope for the future.
